channel.title: Monsters with no hp (checked the autospawn.cfg)
channel.description:
Ok, lots of my monsters i spawn crash the game. I searched the forums and found out this is due to them having no hp, and it said to add hp to them in the autospawn.cfg, well i checked my autospawn and there is nothing there about hitpoints, absolutly zilch. This is my autospawn.cfg, if u can see the problem please tell me what it is, or fix it yourself and send it back to me.
[hr]
Also, while i'm here, does anyone know how i can change where new players spawn on my server?

item.title: Monsters with no hp (checked the autospawn.cfg)
item.dc:creator: @spacemonster spacemonster
item.description:
@spacemonster wrote:

u need to open the npc.cfg there u change the health

Read full topic
